full_summary:
# Rebid #2 W0142-23X010 - Regional Individual Standing Offers for Food Supplies
====================================

### Tender Announcement

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified suppliers to bid on [Rebid #2 W0142-23X010](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18105286) for a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RMSO) contract. The contract is for the supply and delivery of various food products, including dairy and eggs, miscellaneous groceries, fresh produce, and protein, to the Department of National Defence at Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Suffield.

### Tender Details

* **Solicitation Number:** WS3969350499
* **Publication Date:** November 24, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** December 12, 2023 at 14:00 EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** July 1, 2023

### Contract Requirements

The Department of National Defence requires a contractor to provide a Regional Individual Standing Offer for the supply and delivery of food products on an as-and-when-requested basis. The contract will be awarded on the basis of lowest price.

### Evaluation Criteria

* The contractor must be able to provide a detailed list of the food products they can supply.
* The contractor must have the necessary storage and transportation facilities to meet the Department's requirements.
* The contractor must be able to provide certificates of insurance and any other required documentation.

### Classification

This tender is scheduled according to the following UNSPSC codes:

* 50100000 - Nuts and seeds
* 50110000 - Meat and poultry products
* 50120000 - Seafood
* 50130000 - Dairy products and eggs
* 50150000 - Edible oils and fats
* 50160000 - Chocolate and sugars and sweeteners and confectionary products
* 50170000 - Seasonings and preservatives
* 50180000 - Bread and bakery products
* 50190000 - Prepared and preserved foods
* 50200000 - Beverages
* 50220000 - Cereal and pulse products
* 50300000 - Fresh fruits
* 50340000 - Frozen fruit
* 50400000 - Fresh vegetables
* 50440000 - Frozen vegetables

### Contact Information

For further information on the tender, please contact:

Rina Marsland (elle-la / she-her)
Department of Public
